intro.text: Hello, I'm Rafet. I started web development in 2019 by taking online courses. I build web applications utilizing the power of 'MERN Stack' technologies.
intro.heading: Intro

about.heading: About me
about.p1: My journey into the world of web development started with a curiosity for coding, and it has evolved into a commitment to mastering ReactJS. I am on a journey of constantly learning the technologies involved. Although my core stack is MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js, I like to add something to myself by learning new technologies in my spare time. I'm currently improving myself on Next.js and Typescript.
about.p2: In the past, I have developed:

list.Full Scale Web Apps (Frontend + Backend): with MongoDB, Express, React ve Node.js,

projects.title: Odinbook
projects.description: A MERN project that clones some Facebook functionalities. Core functionalities in this project are sign in/sign up, authentication, user search and image upload. Demo user is available.

projects.title: Where's Waldo? (A Photo Tagging App)
projects.description: This is an assignment in The Odin Project. I practiced React Hooks (useReducer, useContext, useEffect, useState, useRef, forwardRef) besides Firebase Storage and Firestore.

projects.title: Shopping Cart
projects.description: A simple shopping cart I coded for the Odin Project. I practiced ContextApi in React.

projects.title: Battleship
projects.description: Factory functions and Test Driven Development were my main focus on this Odin Project built with Webpack.

projects.title: Where In The World?
projects.description: This is a solution to the REST Countries API with color theme switcher challenge on Frontend Mentor.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: A Frontend Mentor challenge with active and completed todos feature.
